shows.title: Hidden History / Evil Entities
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Robert M. Schoch will discuss his latest work demonstrating that there was civilization prior to the end of the last Ice Age roughly 12,000 years ago. Dr. Schoch will also explain how he re-dated the origins of the Great Sphinx from circa 2,500 BC to thousands of years earlier, claiming the current head is likely a re-carving.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and researcher Heidi Hollis will examine the depths of evil, what it is, and where it hides. She'll explore the three realms where evil operates: within humanity, among demons, and by interdimensional entities often described as aliens.

shows.title: Investigating Bigfoot / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Guest host Connie Willis (info) speaks with Bigfoot researcher Thom "Cat" Cantrall about his life investigating hairy cryptids. He'll also share a surprising story about an interplanetary journey. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half—give Connie a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
